type:
∀ {M a b : Real},
  GT.gt M 0 →
    Real.instLT.lt a b →
      ∀ {f : Real → Real},
        ContinuousOn f (Set.Icc a b) →
          DifferentiableOn Real f (Set.Ioo a b) →
            (∀ (x : Real),
                Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioo a b) x → Real.instLE.le (abs (derivWithin f (Set.Ioo a b) x)) M) →
              ∀ {x y : Real},
                Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioo a b) x →
                  Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioo a b) y →
                    Real.instLE.le (abs (instHSub.hSub (f x) (f y))) (instHMul.hMul M (abs (instHSub.hSub x y)))

  Real.instLT.lt a b →
    ∀ {f : Real → Real},
      ContinuousOn f (Set.Icc a b) →
        DifferentiableOn Real f (Set.Ioo a b) →
          Exists fun x =>
            And (Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioo a b) x)
              (HasDerivWithinAt f (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub (f b) (f a)) (instHSub.hSub b a)) (Set.Ioo a b) x)
name: HasDerivWithinAt

type:

  Real.instLT.lt a b →
    ∀ {g : Real → Real},
      ContinuousOn g (Set.Icc a b) →
        DifferentiableOn Real g (Set.Ioo a b) →
          Eq (g a) (g b) →
            Exists fun x => And (Set.instMembership.mem (Set.Ioo a b) x) (HasDerivWithinAt g 0 (Set.Ioo a b) x)
name: HasDerivWithinAt
